select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.device_name , t1.unified_id , t1.device_id , t1.device_model , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.position_id , t1.valid_period , t1.begin_date , t1.end_date , t1.certificate_id , t1.serial_number , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_operation_device t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.VALID_PERIOD like concat(concat('%',#{bean.validPeriod}),'%')
and t1.BEGIN_DATE >= #{bean.beginDateBegin}
and t1.BEGIN_DATE <= #{bean.beginDateEnd}
and t1.END_DATE >= #{bean.endDateBegin}
and t1.END_DATE <= #{bean.endDateEnd}
and t1.CERTIFICATE_ID =#{bean.certificateId}
and t1.SERIAL_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.serialNumber}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc
